heading: The Power of Smart Forests™
list3: Decrease the severity and frequency of wildfires by lowering annual temperatures
list7: Regulate, filter water and moderate water flow
list8: Provide for bees, birds and animals who would otherwise disappear from the area
list10: Help mitigate andor prevent natural disasters like erosion and landslides
list11: Leverage digital tools to maintain and monitor forest quality
list12: Provide an opportunity for all Canadians to better understand the power of a forest
unlock: Unlock the Power of the Forest
smartpara: Smart Forests™ are built by individuals, families, schools and corporations – they are customizable, inclusive and achievable in every province and territory in Canada.
card1para: A turnkey & sustainable solution to meet ESG needs
card2para: An engaging & tangible way for schools and students to combat climate change
card3para: A unique way to leave a healthy planet for future generations
card4para: An opportunity for every Canadian to participate
decreasetitle: Click here to learn how to decrease your environmental impact!
unlocktitle: Unlock the Power of the Forest
unlockpara: Our world is facing the single greatest threat of the 21st century, and as we begin to understand the dire ecological, social and economic consequences of climate change, we need the support of all Canadians.
buildctatitle: Build your forest with Canada’s Forest Trust
